devdoc.details: Like EIP-1167, but for upgradeable contracts, meaning that clone will delegate to proxy which will delegate to actual implemenation. Address of the proxy is immutable, but implementation can be changed via API supporting EIP-1967*

params._initData: Data for deployed token initialize method

returns._0: Predicted address of the next lp token

params._proxyAdminAddress: An address of the proxy admin

devdoc.title: Proxy clones factory
